column1: ගැනීමට අවශ්‍ය පියවර ගන්නා දෙස ජනතාවදගන් කාරුණිකව ඉල්ො සිටිනු ෙැදේ.
GENERAL WEATHER FORECAST FOR NEXT 36 HOURS
The Cyclonic storm “MICHAUNG” (PRONOUNCED AS “MIGJAUM”)  over Southwest Bay of Bengal
was located near latitude 11.8°N and longitude 82.2°E, at 1130hrs of 03 December and about 320
km  northeast  of  Jaffna.  The  system  is  expected  to move  northwestward  near  North coast  of Sri
Lanka towards North Tamil Nadu coast of India. Thereafter, it would move northwards and cross
South Andhra Pradesh coasts around December 05, 2023.
